title: Bux on Killing a Man & Doing 10 Years
description:
Bucks shares his wild story with Sharp, and speaks on his trial and tribulations, doing time, new lease on life and more.

-----
00:00 Intro
5:15 - Growing up in a single-parent home in the 80s in Grand Rapids, Michigan. 
6:52 - Mom encouraged him to go hustle in the streets with his older brothers 
8:03 - Bucks relives the time someone broke into his mom’s house by drilling through the neighbor’s wall
10:38 - Buying his first g*n at 11 yrs old after his house got broken into
13:00 - Grand Rapids is just as rough as any other major city. Shining a light on Breonna Taylor and other recent police incidents in the city
15:22 - Going on the run to Memphis at 16 yrs old
16:28 - Bucks explains how he got scars on his face from getting hit by a car. Finding a new lease on life
19:00 - Bucks remembers getting a g*n pulled on him at the club over a female
23:20 - Bucks explains the video of him fighting two armed guys at a gas station that resulted in one of them dying
25:34 - Doing 10 years in prison from 18 - 28 yrs old
27:15 - Getting into the potato business and opening a potato bar 
36:00 - Sharp explains how he discovered Bucks’ movie on Tubi
42:28 - Bucks’ message to the world: “Don’t let your struggle set you back. Set reachable goals. Protect yourself. Help your people out.”


-----
